name: happy-server-workers
description: Happy Server on Cloudflare Workers with Hono

scripts.help:
echo '
Happy Server Workers - Available Scripts
=========================================

Development:
  dev                Start Wrangler dev server

Deployment:
  deploy             Show deployment help
  deploy:dev         Deploy to development environment
  deploy:prod        Deploy to production environment

Code Quality:
  typecheck          Type-check TypeScript
  lint               Run ESLint
  lint:fix           Run ESLint with auto-fix
  format             Format code with Prettier

Testing:
  test               Run tests once
  test:watch         Run tests in watch mode

Database (D1/Drizzle):
  db:generate        Generate Drizzle migrations from schema
  db:migrate         Apply migrations to remote dev D1 (default)
  db:migrate:local   Apply migrations to local D1
  db:migrate:prod    Apply migrations to remote prod D1
  db:create          Create remote dev D1 database
  db:create:prod     Create remote prod D1 database
  db:status          Show remote dev database status (default)
  db:status:local    Show local database status
  db:reset:local     Reset local database (DESTRUCTIVE)
  db:studio          Open Drizzle Studio GUI
  db:seed            Seed remote dev database
  db:seed:local      Seed local database
  db:seed:preview    Preview seed SQL without executing
  db:seed:test       Seed remote dev with test data
  db:compare         Validate schema parity with Prisma
'
scripts.db:seed: tsx src/db/seed.ts > /tmp/seed.sql && wrangler d1 execute DB --env dev --remote --file=/tmp/seed.sql
scripts.db:seed:local: tsx src/db/seed.ts > /tmp/seed.sql && wrangler d1 execute DB --env dev --local --file=/tmp/seed.sql
scripts.db:seed:test: tsx scripts/seed-test-data.ts > /tmp/seed-test.sql && wrangler d1 execute DB --env dev --remote --file=/tmp/seed-test.sql
